message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I think it will be a valuable asset to you, and this is a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a significant amount to me. I could come down to $19,000. That's my best offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to get a reasonable price for this product. How about we split the difference and settle at $18,250?
I understand your position, but I'm still trying to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $17,000 for the product.
